body:
I get requests to backport Jedi Academy player models to Jedi Outcast occasionally. This could be automated.

I'm not entirely sure if that's in scope of this project or should be a standalone script. If I do it in-client, there should be a way to execute it from the command line?

Ideally I would be able to compile it to web assembly so I can offer it as a website without the need for uploading.

milestone.title: Tools
milestone.description: Make the game easier to mod.

title: JA player model to JO conversion
